title: Activate Signal Response
description: Response payload for activate_signal task. Different platforms use different activation models: segment-based (DSPs/SSPs), key-value targeting (GAM/ad servers), or deal-based (PMP/PG).

decisioning_platform_segment_id.description: Platform-specific segment ID (for segment-based platforms like DSPs/SSPs such as The Trade Desk, DV360, Scope3)

targeting_key_values.description: Key-value pairs for ad server targeting (for GAM and similar ad servers that use KV targeting)

deal_id.description: Deal identifier for deal-based activation (for PMP/PG deals)

activation_metadata.description: Additional platform-specific activation data (optional, for platform-specific requirements beyond the primary targeting mechanism)

errors.description: Task-specific errors and warnings (e.g., activation failures, platform issues)
